Package org.jsmsengine

Interface Summary
CSmsMessageListener  
 

Class Summary
CATHandler This class contains all the AT commands which are used during communication of the API with the GSM device.
CATHandler_Nokia AT Hanlder for Nokia GSM devices.
CATHandler_Siemens AT Hanlder for Siemens GSM devices.
CATHandler_SonyEricsson AT handler for SonyEricsson 2003, 2004 and 2005 series devices.
CATHandler_Wavecom AT Hanlder for Wavecom GSM devices.
CDeviceInfo This class keeps information and statistics about the usage of the GSM device.
CGSMAlphabets This class contains the conversion routines to and from the standard 7bit GSM alphabet.
CIncomingMessage This class represents an incoming SMS message, i.e. message read from the GSM device.
CMessage This class encapsulates the basic characteristics of an SMS message.
COutgoingMessage This class represents an outgoing SMS message, i.e. message created for dispatch from the GSM device.
CPhoneBook This class handles the operation of the phonebook.
CSerialDriver This class handles the operation the serial port.
CService This class provides all the functionality of jSMSEngine API to the developer.
CStatusReportMessage This class represents a Status Report SMS message.
CUtils This class has some general purpose functions.
 

Exception Summary
AlreadyConnectedException Thrown when there is a connection with the GSM device and you try to reconnect.
CannotDisableIndicationsException Thrown when the API cannot disable the delivery indications of GSM device.
InvalidPinException Thrown when the PIN number used is invalid and rejected by the GSM device.
jSMSEngineException Parent Exception class for all exceptions thrown from jSMSEngine API.
NoPduSupportException Thrown when the GSM device does not support the PDU communication format.
NoPinException The GSM device requests a PIN to continue, but no PIN has been defined.
NoResponseException Thrown when there is no response from the GSM device.
NotConnectedException Thrown when there is no connection established to the GSM device.
